messages.body: $TSLA Waymo appears way ahead I the fully automatic race. Driverless ride share launched in Phoenix. https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2017/nov/07/google-waymo-announces-fully-autonomous-ride-hailing-service-uber-alphabet

links.title: Google sibling Waymo launches fully autonomous ride-hailing service
links.description: Waymo, formerly known as Google's self-driving car, is launching a fully autonomous Uber-like ride-hailing service with no human driver behind the wheel, after testing the vehicles on public roads in Arizona. Waymo, which is owned by Google parent Alphabet, said members of the public will begin riding in its fleet of modified Fiat Chrysler Pacifica minivans outfitted with self-driving technology in the next few months.

message.body: Tesla Receives Big-Rig Truck Orders Worth About $15 Million $TSLA @teslamotors http://bit.ly/2AGZsct $SYY $BUD $JBHY $WMT

links.title: Tesla Receives Big-Rig Truck Orders Worth About $15 Million | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: It's been a good week for Tesla ( TSLA), which received reservation orders for 90 of the company's electric tractor-trailer trucks from Sysco ( SYY) and Anheuser-Busch InBev ( BUD), though the planned vehicle won't start shipping until 2019. Food distribution company Sysco, on Friday, announced it placed reservations for 50 of Tesla's new fully-electric trucks, named Semi.
